title: IHCL announces the signing of a new Vivanta hotel in Talegaon, Pune
description: The 140-keys hotel spread over 2.5 acres is located on Talegaon MIDC road. The hotel will feature an all-day diner-Mynt, a speciality restaurant and Wink, the bar with over 4000 square feet of banquet space. The recreation facilities will include a swimming pool, a gym and a spa.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
